issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

fields.summary: MobileWeb: Implement the polynomial layout algorithm

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: It appears that firefox handles borders differently from the other browsers when width/height are specified in an absolute container. Need to work around this limitation. Buttons are most obviously affected by this bug, but all controls are affected.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Borders/width/height settings in absolute containers behave differently on Firefox.

comments.body: This was fixed by the polynomial layout in TIMOB-8275.
